mapper.select: SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state, num FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state, rownum as num FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state FROM OFFICIAL where state = 0 order by cid desc)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 15.0) FROM OFFICIAL where STATE = 0
SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state FROM OFFICIAL WHERE cid = #{id}
